attributes.additional_details:
Stephen Sutton selfishly dedicated his dieing days to raising money for cancer sufferers.
He was not a celebrity, a public figure, nor someone who could personally benefit from the money raised, or the fame he attracted.
He did not court fame, nor fortune, and his only desire was to help others.
As of today, the sad day of his passing, he had achieved exactly that, and raised in excess of £3 million.
Stephen was a truly inspirational character, not only for the money he raised, but also for the manner in which he appriached his death.
He is a true national treasure, and thoroughly deserves a posthumous recognition for his services to this country.
